igeo
Class IBasicMaterial

java.lang.Object
  igeo.IMaterial
      igeo.IBasicMaterial

public class IBasicMaterial
extends IMaterial

A Class of rendering material properties for IObject geometries. In the current version, this material information is not used yet.

Author:
Satoru Sugihara
